data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kobe.
In the minute 2, Free kick Kobe.
Throw-in Sendai.
Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
In the minute 4, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Gotoku Sakai gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Sendai's Shun Nagasawa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 7, Yoshiro Imamura awards Kobe a goal kick.
Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In the minute 8, Sendai have a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Kobe.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Sendai's area.
Throw-in for Sendai at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 18, Sendai's Kunimitsu Sekiguchi breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kobe a goal kick.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Own goal! Dankler scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Kobe are coming forward and Dyanfrez Douglas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Sendai at Noevir Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 45, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Sergi Samper (Kobe) has received a yellow card from Yoshiro Imamura.
The second-half is underway at Noevir Stadium.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Yasuhiro Hiraoka with Kim Jung-Ya.
In the minute 46, Shuhei Akasaki is on a sub for Shun Nagasawa for Sendai.
In the minute 47, Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sendai at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Sendai have a goal kick.
Kobe drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 53, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sergi Samper for Kobe drives towards goal at Noevir Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Sendai at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 68, Sendai have a goal kick.
Kobe make their first substitution with Yutaro Oda replacing Sergi Samper.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shuhei Akasaki heads in to give Sendai a 0-2 lead at Noevir Stadium.
Great play from Koji Hachisuka to set up the goal.
In the minute 73, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kobe throw-in in Sendai's half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Thorsten Fink is making the team's second substitution at Noevir Stadium with Noriaki Fujimoto replacing Dyanfrez Douglas.
In the minute 82, Ryo Hatsuse is replacing Gotoku Sakai for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Throw-in Kobe.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ryutaro Iio (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a third substitution, with Ryutaro Iio replacing Takahiro Yanagi.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kobe.
In the minute 86, It's now 1-2 thanks to an own goal from Keijiro Ogawa.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Shogo Nakahara is replacing Kunimitsu Sekiguchi for the away team.
Sendai are whistled for offside.
At Noevir Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kobe's Thomas Vermaelen breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sendai at Noevir Stadium.
Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Kobe. The final score is 1-2.
